p: To shed light on the possible mode of action of BEO, we assayed its inhibitory properties against AChE, which is an important target for testing the insecticidal potential of synthetic and natural products. In our assay, the BEO half-inhibited AChE at a concentration of 0.45 mg·mL −1 ( Table 4). This IC 50 value was about 56-times higher than that of galanthamine used as positive control and corresponded to 17.97 mgGEIC·gr −1.
